title: Barossa Valley Vineyard Escape with Onsite Restaurant & Spa
description:
Discover the rustic charm of South Australia's wine country with a stay at the Novotel Barossa Valley Resort. Overlooking the renowned Jacob's Creek Vineyards, this tranquil retreat offers panoramic views of the Barossa Ranges, with each room boasting a private balcony.

Explore the local wineries, dine at the hotel's Cellar Kitchen restaurant, indulge in some me-time at the onsite Endota Spa, or take a swing at the adjacent Tanunda Pines Golf Course. For a change of pace, take a scenic drive to the Whispering Wall, a unique acoustic marvel located within the Barossa Reservoir.
offer_address: Via The Pioneer Avenue, Barossa Valley Way, Rowland Flat, South Australia 5352, Australia
